ComicInfo.Summary:
Poisoned Paradise is the first of Billy Tucci's all-new stories of Shi through the ages, and is set in the Feudal times of warlords, samurai and wandering Ronin. After a vicious sword battle, an injured Shi is taken in by a small village to recover. But there will be little time for rest as Shi must defend these innocents against an approaching samurai army! The time period is brought back to life with the luscious artwork of Karl Waller and vibrant colors by Nimbus. Death has a new face this summer, and Shi's back in full force!
